name: COWBOY SUPERNOVA: STARDUST ELECTRIC
description:
Face onslaughts of waves of alien invaders from another dimension who scheme to enslave the universe, Only you, █████ can uphold peace and justice for all! Will you clash with the power of 10,000 supernovas? Or will the core of your being collapse in on itself?

Straight from an arcade from another dimension, with 4 different ways to play! It's Cowboy Supernova: Stardust Electric!

You can also listen and download the game's original soundtrack!
